member.name: IVisualTreeService3.AddDictionaryItem

summary.code: Adds an item to a ResourceDictionary, and re-resolves all elements in the tree that reference a resource with the specified key.

member.param: The dictionary to add the resource to.
The key of the resource to add.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeService3.RemoveDictionaryItem

summary.code: Removes an item from a ResourceDictionary, and re-resolves all elements in the tree that reference a resource with the specified key.

member.param: The dictionary to remove the resource from.
The key of the resource to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeService3.ResolveResource
member.summary: Resolves a resource for an element in the tree and applies the resource to the property provided by the specified property index.
member.param: The index of the property to apply the resource to.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeService3
member.summary: Represents additional capabilities of an IVisualTreeService2 object.
